infos.value: This concludes my explanation. I shall explain Guild Statues, the Barracks, and Guild Quests in detail once you pay a visit to them.
I shall explain Guild Statues, the Barracks, and Guild Quests in detail at a later time.
• Lobby •

• Lobby •
This is the Guild Lobby. You can utilize all of your guild's features from here.
• Daily Rewards •

• Daily Rewards •
Here, you can see how many guild members are attending. Members acquire rewards based on the total number of members in attendance and the level of your Guild Statues.
• About Attendance •

• About Attendance •
Attendance will be automatically counted when Guild Functions like Gifts and Barracks are used.
• Gifts •

• Gifts •
Gifts can be sent to fellow Guild Members.
• Menu •

• Menu •
Here, you can look up information about your guild and its members. You can also send Join Requests and Invites or leave your current guild.
• Shrine •

• Guild Statues •
Here, you can enhance your Guild Statues.
• Barracks/Altar •

• Barracks/Altar •
You can confirm the status of your remaining provisions and offerings via the Lobby.
• Guild Battles •

• Guild Battles •
You can confirm your guild's battle ranking and league qualification via the Lobby.
• Guild Quests •

• Guild Quests •
You can confirm whether or not a campaign is active via the Lobby.
• Guilds •
Proceed to a tutorial on Guilds?
Yes
No
